        protected java.util.List<java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>> groupMembership

      • findClusters

        protected void findClusters(int pixelValue)

      • findClustersIterative

        protected void findClustersIterative(int pixelValue)
        NOTE: to keep the performance reasonable, the use of jvm stack has to be reduced. For default jvm settings, the size of the local array variable within this method frame should be kept to having fewer that 128k items in it, therefore the GreyscaleImage should be binned before use to keep the number of pixels below 128k/1.5 (roughly keep below 87000 pixels). If all pixels are connected, that limit has to be lowered.
        Parameters:
        pixelValue -
